title: Designing AgBi3S5 as an efficient electrocatalyst for hydrogen evolution reaction
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2941-2953
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00428K, Paper
Anupam Chowdhury, Aditi De, Subrata Kundu, Swapan Kumar Bhattacharya
Nano-catalysts Ag2S, Bi2S3, AgBi3S5 and CuBiS2 are synthesized by facile hot chemical treatments and used for electrochemical hydrogen evolution reaction in acid. The best catalyst AgBi3S5 can be designed for generation of green fuel hydrogen.
